title: 9/1 - Spacious 3 Bedroom w/ Balcony in Central Sq, Cambridge! (No Fee)
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 303332668', 'Rent: $3,595 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot/Cold Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Available for Sept 1st!', '(Cleaned and painted between tenants!)', '**', "No Broker's Fee ** (", "Only Two Month's Down for well-qualified applicants!)", 'Spacious and Freshly Painted 3 Bedroom/1 Bath w/ Private Balcony located in a quiet and professionally managed building on Harvard Street in Cambridge, in a location that cannot be beaten!', 'Only a 10-min walk to Harvard Square, and just 5 minutes walking distance to Whole Foods, and YMCA of Cambridge.', "The Red Line at Central Square is just 8 minutes' walking distance.", 'This neighborhood is considered both a Biker and Walker’s Paradise - Scoring top marks scoring an average of over 95 out of 100 points!', 'This apartment features hardwood flooring throughout, a spacious foyer, a nice sized eat-in kitchen with a pantry, a private balcony, a large living room, two good sized bedrooms, and one oversized bedroom.', 'The bathroom is fully filled and there is a walk-in closet in the foyer.', 'The rent includes heat, hot/cold water, there is mobile app powered laundry in the building, and indoor/outdoor bike storage.', "- No Broker's Fee!", '- 2nd Floor (No Elevator)', '- Private Balcony', '- Walker’s Paradise - Scoring 94 out of 100 points!', '(Daily errands do not require a car)', '- Biker’s Paradise - Scoring 97 out of 100 points!', '(Flat as a pancake, excellent bike lanes)', '- Professionally Managed', '- Close to Whole Foods and Harvard Sq!', '- Cat-Friendly', '- Free on-street parking with a residential permit', '- The rent includes heat and hot/cold water', '- Laundry Facilities in the building (Mobile Pay)', '- Bike storage (Indoor/Outdoor)', 'Subway Lines', 'Red Line - Central Sq (0.31 miles)', 'Bus Routes', '83 Bus - Prospect St & Broadway (0.21 mi)', '68 Bus - Broadway & Prospect St (0.22 mi)', 'CT2 Bus - 30 Prospect St (0.25 mi)', '64 Bus - Western Ave & Green St (0.29 mi)', '70 Bus - Green St & Magazine St (0.32 mi)', 'CT1 Bus - Magazine St & Green St (0.32 mi)', '70A Bus - Green St & Magazine St (0.32 mi)', '91 Bus - Magazine St & Green St (0.32 mi)', '69 Bus - Cambridge St & Hampshire St (0.38 mi)', 'null']
